item.title: Trash
item.description: My mom gave me eyes, a nose and terrible knees. If my genetic history is to be taken seriously, around 40 years old I won’t be able to hit the streets for a run anymore. And that sucks. Because I love running on pavement. The subtle, muted drum of my Nike shoes on the ground warrants days I run without an iPod. I love the quiet, exercise and time to think.
